TopicTitle: BUG? Can't click/right click buildings occasionally.

Articles.Content:
Hello folks, i am currently playing a very heavily modded ksp career at the moment. Every now and then on going back to the space center, i either won't be able to right click a building, or i won't be able to click on them at all.

It's very intermittent. But annoying. has anyone come across this and managed to trace down the fault?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-23T22:18:12Z" title="07/23/2015 10:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 23, 2015</time> by SmashBrown**
Aaaand jeb just got out a plane and was flung off to somewhere high in orbit around the sun apparently.... also all i can see is the skybox now... no ksc... nothing

If you're using 64 Bit Install then I think even with stock, you will sometimes very rarely lose right click. Can usually be fixed by exiting to main menu. And as far as mods go... we'll there are a lot of possible offenders. Only one I know for sure causes it for me is Adjustable landing gear, but that's only in the VAB/SPH scene. And it can usually be restored by clicking around on other parts or exiting and reentering the scene.
